entry.title: RAND Experts Available to Discuss New U.N. Sanctions on North Korea, Upcoming U.S. Summit with South Korea
entry.summary: The RAND Corporation has several experts available to discuss the just-announced United Nations sanctions on North Korea, as well as next week's summit between President Barack Obama and South Korean President Lee Myung-bak. RAND experts are prepared to answer questions on the potential impacts of the sanctions, the likelihood of sanction enforcement, potential North Korean responses, the U.S./ROK alliance, and the principle of extended deterrence and how it applies to the alliance.
